languages.text: "Отойди от этой штуки — и будешь жить".
"Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
languages.original_text: "Отойди от этой штуки — и будешь жить".

traits.locale_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
"Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
"Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
"Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
"Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
"Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."

languages.text: 「その装置から離れろ。そうすれば命は奪わずにいてやろう」
languages.original_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."

traits.locale_text: 「その装置から離れろ。そうすれば命は奪わずにいてやろう」

languages.text: “离这玩意儿远点，我就饶你一命。”
languages.original_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."

traits.locale_text: “离这玩意儿远点，我就饶你一命。”

languages.text: «Aléjate del artefacto y te dejaré vivir».
languages.original_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."

traits.locale_text: «Aléjate del artefacto y te dejaré vivir».

languages.text: "Weg von der Apparatur, dann lasse ich Euch leben."
languages.original_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."

traits.locale_text: "Weg von der Apparatur, dann lasse ich Euch leben."

languages.text: « Éloignez-vous de cet engin, et je vous laisserai la vie sauve. »
languages.original_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."

traits.locale_text: « Éloignez-vous de cet engin, et je vous laisserai la vie sauve. »

languages.original_text: "Step away from the contraption, and I shall let you live."
